definitions.definition: A mark or expression of applause ; praise bestowed .
examples: The plaudits reverberated thunderously in the auditorium.

definitions.definition: An award or commendation ; a formal recognition of approval or achievement .
examples: Sofie has been showered in plaudits for her paradigm-shifting discoveries.

main_definition: A mark or expression of applause ; praise bestowed .
secondary_definitions: ( now often specifically ) An award or commendation ; a formal recognition of approval or achievement .
